paswaru 1.00 diwa wandanawa ha sethpirith , 1.30 dharma sakachchawa diwiyagaha yasassi na himi, shasthrapathi ee ranawira aarachchi mahatha 3.00 dharma deshanawa darshanapathi agalakada sirisumana himi, 4.15 mawpiya upahara dharma deshanaya pitaduwe dhammika himi 5.45 wathawath 6.00 gilanpasa buddha pujawa ha seth pirith.yatinuwara kobbakaduwa shri wardhanarama wiharasthanaya mul karagena pawathwanu labana warshika wesak punya mahothsawaya, 2600 shri sambuddhathwa jayanthi samarumata samagamiwa mewarath pawathwe.
